name: TimeRift - GMTK 2020
description:
What would happen if time was out of your normal control?

TimeShift is a puzzle based acton time bending game.  Use time to solve puzzles and fight badies as you go on your journoy to restore Time to the world.

May thee have the most fun!

controls
  • move - WASD
  • dash - right mouse click
  • attack - left mouse button
